operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO users (user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, country_code, verified, about, is_bot) VALUES (:user_type, :access_hash, :secret_key_id, :first_name, :last_name, :username, :phone, :country_code, :verified, :about, :is_bot)

operation.name: SelectByPhoneNumber
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE phone=:phone LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectById
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE id=:id LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectUsersByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE id IN (:id_list)

operation.name: SelectUsersByPhoneList
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE phone IN (:phoneList)

operation.name: SelectByQueryString
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE username = :username OR first_name = :first_name OR last_name = :last_name OR phone = :phone limit 20

operation.name: SearchByQueryNotIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM users WHERE username LIKE :q2 AND id NOT IN(:id_list) LIMIT :limit

operation.name: Delete
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET deleted=1, delete_reason = :delete_reason WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateUsername
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET username=:username WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateFirstAndLastName
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET first_name = :first_name, last_name = :last_name WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAbout
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateProfile
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET first_name = :first_name, last_name = :last_name, about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectByUsername
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM users WHERE username=:username LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectAccountDaysTTL
operation.sql: SELECT account_days_ttl FROM users WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAccountDaysTTL
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET account_days_ttl = :account_days_ttl WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectProfilePhoto
operation.sql: SELECT photo_id FROM users WHERE id=:id LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectCountryCode
operation.sql: SELECT country_code FROM users WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateProfilePhoto
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET photo_id = :photo_id WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateUser
operation.sql: UPDATE users SET cMap = :cMap WHERE id=:id

operation.name: QueryChannelParticipants
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_type, access_hash, secret_key_id, first_name, last_name, username, phone, photo_id, country_code, verified, about, is_bot, deleted FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM channel_participants WHERE channel_id = :channelId AND state = 0) AND (first_name LIKE :q1 OR last_name LIKE :q2 OR username LIKE :q3)
